com.microsoft.windowsazure.tracing

Class CloudTracing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.tracing.CloudTracing

  • public abstract class CloudTracing
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides tracing utilities that insight into all aspects of client operations via implementations of the ICloudTracingInterceptor interface. All tracing is global.

        Returns:
